summary: A number of personal tweaks i made to improve my skyrim experience.I decided to share it anyway so it may help somebody.
descriptionHtml:
SPST - sony\'s personal skyrim tweaks
A number of personal tweaks i made to improve my skyrim experience .It is not intended for  mass usage.It is made for personal usage.I decided to share it anyway so it may help somebody.
What is the Spst ?
When i started playing skyrim there were a couple of things bothering me.This is my solution.
So what are the tweaks?
1I made the maximum chance for pickpocketing 100 percent because everytime i was caught stealing a dumb item only because of the cap i needed to load and i was frustrated by this artificial limitation.
2Second of all i was heavily frustrated by the limit of only 5 times training a level.Now it is 50 so you could properly spend your money.
3.I doubled the amount of time and the number of bodies staying.I made it because i hate when i go back to a place and the bodies have dissapeared for no apparent reason too fast.

Manual installation notes:
1)Put the file Spst.esp in the skyrim/data
2)Activate it with your favourite mod manager
Nexus mod manager installation notes:
1)Click download with manager
2)Activate the esp with the nexus mod manager



Changelog:
3/5/2012
V 1.0 Initial release

If u like the mod please come back and endorse it,so other people could find it and enjoy it :)Also endorsments increase my will to continue developing mods :)
For any assistance,good attitude,nice video or pictures i will give kudos :)


For further suggestions,feedback,bugs reports,requests and ideas refer to the comment section.I will try to answer as fast i can and give as full feedback as i can.
My other mods:Tomb of Ahranas -
author: Powerclick
